_header: As that I walked in the month of May
Note:
For the original French see Meyer (1879)
XMeyer, Paul. “Les Manuscrits Français de Cambridge.” Romania 8 (1879): 305-57.
Title(s): A Balade to the Virgin Mary and Christ
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour of; Virgin Mary and Christ, songs/prayers to
_description: A Balade to the Virgin Mary and Christ, translated from the French by Hoccleve — twenty 8-line stanzas

HunHM111.First Lines:
As þat I walkid in the monthe of MayBesyde a groue in an heuy
                    musynge…
HunHM111.Last Lines:
…Be tendre of vs o thow blissid virgyneffor if thee list we
                    shuln to blisse atteyne
HunHM111.Attributed Title:
Ceste balade ensuyante feust translatee au commandement de mon Meistre
                        Robert Chichele (f. 43v)
